plugins.name: Section Template Manager
plugins.description:
Section Template Manager streamlines your daily workflow in FigJam by automatically duplicating template sections with today's date. Perfect for teams who use FigJam for daily stand-ups, retrospectives, or any recurring activities.


Key Features:

• One-click duplication - No UI, just instant action

• Automatic dating - New sections are named with today's date (YYYY-MM-DD)

• Smart organization - Existing dated sections automatically shift to maintain chronological order

• Template flexibility - Any section starting with "TEMPLATE" becomes a reusable template


How it works:

1. Create a section with a name starting with "TEMPLATE"

2. Run the plugin

3. Your template is duplicated with today's date, and existing sections are organized


Perfect for:

• Daily KPT (Keep/Problem/Try) retrospectives

• Team stand-up meetings

• Weekly reports and reviews

• Project status tracking

• Any recurring documentation needs


Save time and maintain consistency in your team's documentation workflow. No more manual copying or renaming - let Section Template Manager handle the repetitive tasks so you can focus on what matters.
plugins.tagline: Organize your daily sections with one click

plugins.name: 文案提取与替换 Text Extractor & Replacer
plugins.description:
介绍

文案提取与替换是一款高效实用的 Figma 插件，可快速提取选中元素中的文本，并支持批量修改与一键替换，适用于多语言版本设计、内容本地化与运营迭代场景。


功能说明

  1. 提取选中节点中的全部文本内容
  2. 自动合并重复文案并展示唯一列表
  3. 可逐条输入替换文案
  4. 支持一键替换全部或单条替换
  5. 支持复制原文案、一键恢复初始值
  6. 替换后自动更新当前原文显示


使用方法

  1. 选中一个或多个页面元素
  2. 点击【📋 提取选中文案】，展示全部原文案
  3. 输入对应的替换内容
  4. 点击【替换】按钮应用更改（可单条或全部替换）
  5. 点击【复制】获取原文，或点击【恢复】重填初始内容


注意事项

  1. 插件执行替换前需加载原文字体（已自动处理）
  2. 替换仅影响文本内容，不修改字体样式
  3. 替换基于精确匹配，请确保输入一致
  4. 请在提取前确保已选中有效节点


Introduction

Text Extractor & Replacer is a practical Figma plugin designed to help you quickly extract and batch replace text from selected elements—ideal for multi-language design workflows, localization, and content iteration.


Function Description

  1. Extract all text from selected nodes
  2. Display a unique list of original strings
  3. Edit replacements in a unified interface
  4. One-click replace for individual or all text
  5. Copy original text and restore initial values anytime
  6. Auto-update "original" label after each replacement


How to Use

  1. Select one or more elements in your Figma file
  2. Click 📋 Extract Text to list all unique texts
  3. Input replacement values next to each entry
  4. Click Replace (per-row or globally) to apply changes
  5. Use Copy to copy source text or Restore to revert input


Notes

  1. Font loading is required before text replacement (handled automatically)
  2. This plugin only replaces text values, not font styles
  3. Replacements are based on exact match
  4. Make sure to select nodes before extraction

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Quickly extract and replace text in bulk with ease

plugins.name: Zeytal Variables Extractor
plugins.description:
Zeytal helps developers extract and optimize SVGs, transform Figma styles and variables, and generate TailwindCSS config files effortlessly.


This plugin helps Zeytal users leverage their Figma variables.


Zeytal Features

  1. Extract and optimize SVGs
  2. Extract and convert Figma variables to .ts, .js, .json, .css, .scss, .sass, and .less files
  3. Extract and convert Figma styles to .ts, .js, .json, .css, .scss, .sass, and .less files
  4. Convert Figma styles and variables to TailwindCSS v4 config files.


This Plugin

This plugin helps Figma users prepare their Figma files for Figma variables extraction and code generation.


How it works :

  1. Start the plugin.
  2. Click on one button to export your Figma variables to Zeytal
  3. Use Zeytal CLI to generate your code and config files


Everything is explained in detail in Zeytal documentation.
plugins.tagline: From Figma to Code In One Command Line

133510.description:

plugins.name: SVGinify
plugins.description:
Convert SVG's in single files or Symbol Sprite.

This plugin will suit you if you use icons in your project as SVG Sprite using <use> tag.

Automatically cleans SVG from unnecessary attributes.


How to use:

You must select Component Variants with your icons.

Component variants must have the following properties:

  1. name - string
  2. stroke - Off / On


Component Variants must have no errors.
plugins.tagline: Convert SVG's in single files or Symbol Sprite

plugins.name: AI Brand Guide
plugins.description:
AI Brand Guide transforms your design files into comprehensive, professional brand guides in seconds. Extract and organize design elements from your Figma files to create beautiful, developer-friendly documentation.


Key Features

  1. Intelligent Design Element Categorization: Automatically organizes your elements into Buttons, Icons, and Other Elements based on naming patterns
  2. Multi-Frame Export: Choose between Single Frame (all sections in one scrollable frame) or Separate Frames (each section in its own dedicated frame)
  3. Color Palette Extraction: Automatically extracts colors from your selection with detailed RGB, HEX, and HSL values
  4. AI-Powered Color Naming: Generate professional, creative names for your color palette with a single click
  5. Color Theory Generation: Create comprehensive color theory documentation including palette overview, color roles, visual qualities, and usage recommendations
  6. Typography Hierarchy System: Extracts and organizes typography into a structured system with Header and Paragraph classifications
  7. Component Documentation: Displays detailed specifications for buttons, icons and other elements including exact dimensions and padding values
  8. Visual Previews: Generates thumbnail previews for all design elements
  9. Form Element Detection: Special handling for contact forms and other form elements with improved display


How It Works

  1. Select your design elements in Figma (frames, components, or entire pages)
  2. Generate your brand guide with a single click
  3. Customize your guide: Rename colors, add color theory, or organize elements
  4. Export to Figma: Choose your preferred layout style and generate a complete brand guide directly in your Figma file


Element Categorization

For best results, use these naming patterns:

  1. Buttons: Include "btn" or "button" in the name (e.g., "btn-primary", "submit-button")
  2. Icons: Include "icn" or "icon" in the name (e.g., "icn-home", "arrow-icon")
  3. Other Elements: Include "element" or "other" in the name (e.g., "card-element", "other-banner")


What's Included in Your Brand Guide

  1. Color Palette: Complete color documentation with visual swatches and color codes
  2. Typography System: Organized type hierarchy with font details and visual examples
  3. Buttons Collection: All button variants with exact dimensions and padding specifications
  4. Icon Library: Organized icon set with dimensions and specifications
  5. Additional Elements: Cards, banners, forms and other UI components with detailed measurements
  6. Color Theory: Optional section providing insights on palette psychology, symbolism and usage


AI Brand Guide helps design teams maintain consistency while giving developers the exact specifications they need to implement designs accurately.
plugins.tagline: Transform designs into comprehensive brand guides with AI-powered color intelligence.

plugins.name: Flatten Vectors Within
plugins.description:
A simple plugin that flattens all vector shapes (such as rectangles, ellipses, lines, and paths) within each selected frame or group into a single vector layer. Each frame or group is processed individually, so layers aren’t merged throughout. It’s a quick way to clean up icons or illustrations and make overrides easier when turning them into components.


Created with the help of AI.


How to use the plugin

  1. Select one or more frames or groups that contain vector layers.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Each frame or group will now contain a single vector layer named Vector.

accepted.name: Ali Salem
accepted.description: A product designer driven by a sense of responsibility towards enabling and empowering others. Currently building Design Systems at Auth0.

plugins.tagline: Flattens vectors in each selected frame or group into one layer — processed separately.

plugins.name: Contrast ◈ | WCAG + APCA
plugins.description:
Get both WCAG and APCA contrast validation in one seamless tool. Contrast ◈ brings familiar Figma styling and workflows to accessibility testing, making it easy to check compliance during design rather than after handoff.


Key features:

  1. Dual standard support: Traditional WCAG guidelines plus modern APCA perceptual contrast
  2. Native Figma UI design patterns
  3. Quick selection options that fit naturally into your existing design process
  4. Perfect for teams transitioning between contrast standards
  5. Immediate feedback to catch accessibility issues early


Whether you're meeting current WCAG requirements or preparing for future perceptual contrast standards, Contrast ◈ keeps your workflow smooth while ensuring your designs are accessible to all users.
plugins.tagline: Familiar Figma based UI for quick color contrast check beyond WCAG basics

138819.name: Contrast ◈ | WCAG + APCA

plugins.name: 图表库 Chart Master
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows designers to quickly insert predefined design frames into their projects with just a click. It simplifies the process of applying consistent styles, layouts, and content, enhancing productivity and design consistency.


Features Introduction

•Insert predefined design frames with a single click.

•Automatically apply layout settings and styles to frames.

•Supports multiple language interfaces (English, Chinese, etc.).

•Real-time error notifications and fallbacks for seamless user experience.


How to Use

1.Open the Figma plugin and choose your desired design frame.

2.Click the insert button to add the frame to your design.

3.Customize the frame as needed—styles and layouts are already applied.

4.Switch languages via the plugin settings if required.


Notes

•Ensure all necessary fonts are installed to avoid fallback issues.

•If errors occur, check the console for detailed messages.

•Language settings can be changed anytime through the plugin interface.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件让设计师可以轻松地在项目中插入预定义的设计框架。通过简化应用一致的样式、布局和内容的过程，插件提高了生产力和设计一致性。


功能说明

•一键插入预定义的设计框架。

•自动应用框架的布局设置和样式。

•支持多语言界面（英语、中文等）。

•实时错误通知和回退功能，确保无缝用户体验。


使用方法

1.打开 Figma 插件，选择您需要的设计框架。

2.点击插入按钮，将框架添加到您的设计中。

3.根据需要自定义框架—样式和布局已自动应用。

4.如果需要，通过插件设置切换语言。


注意事项

•确保已安装所有必要的字体，以避免回退问题。

•如果发生错误，请检查控制台获取详细信息。

•可以随时通过插件界面更改语言设置。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Insert and Style Design Frames with a Click

plugins.name: WCAG 色彩对比检查 WCAG Color Checker
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin helps you evaluate the contrast ratio between text and background colors in your design frames, ensuring they meet WCAG accessibility standards. Perfect for designers aiming to improve readability and accessibility.


Function Introduction

•Check text-background contrast ratio within selected frames.

•Evaluate contrast according to WCAG standards (AAA, AA, A, Fail).

•Visualize contrast results and interact with your design directly.

•Automatic identification and highlighting of areas needing improvement.


Usage

1.Select a frame in your Figma file.

2.Run the plugin and click “Check Contrast.”

3.Review the results, which are sorted by contrast ratio.

4.Click on any result to highlight and improve specific text elements.


Notes

•Ensure text layers are properly named for better result identification.

•The plugin currently supports checking text against solid color backgrounds only.

•For best results, use the plugin on well-structured design frames.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件帮助您评估设计画板中文本与背景颜色之间的对比度，以确保其符合 WCAG 无障碍设计标准。非常适合希望提升可读性和无障碍性的设计师。


功能说明

•检查选定画板中文本与背景的对比度。

•根据 WCAG 标准评估对比度（AAA、AA、A、Fail）。

•可视化对比度结果并直接与设计交互。

•自动识别和突出显示需要改进的区域。


使用方法

1.在 Figma 文件中选择一个画板。

2.运行插件并点击“检查对比度”。

3.查看按对比度排序的结果。

4.点击任一结果以突出并改进特定的文本元素。


注意事项

•确保文本图层正确命名，以便更好地识别结果。

•插件目前仅支持检查与纯色背景的文本对比。

•为获得最佳效果，请在结构良好的设计画板上使用插件。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Quickly check and improve contrast ratios in Figma frames with one click.

plugins.name: FigSheet - Excel & Google Sheets Viewer/Editor
plugins.description:
📊 Figma에서 스프레드시트를 바로 확인하세요!


🚀 핵심 기능

• URL 연동: Google Sheets, Excel Online을 URL로 바로 불러오기

• 파일 업로드: CSV, Excel 파일을 drag & drop으로 즉시 확인

• 편집/보기 모드: 필요에 따라 실시간 편집 또는 읽기 전용 모드 선택

• 데이터 내보내기: CSV 다운로드, 클립보드 복사로 데이터 활용


🎯 차별화 포인트

✅ 국내 유일 완전 한국어 지원 스프레드시트 뷰어

✅ URL + 로컬 파일 두 방식 모두 지원하는 올인원 솔루션

✅ 드래그 앤 드롭으로 3초 만에 파일 확인

✅ 10MB까지 대용량 Excel 파일 처리 가능


💼 활용 사례

• 실제 데이터로 테이블/차트 디자인 작업

• 기획자 스펙 시트를 실시간으로 참조

• 클라이언트 제공 데이터를 즉시 검토

• Figma를 벗어나지 않고 모든 데이터 작업 완료


Figma에서 더 이상 창을 전환하지 마세요. FigSheet로 모든 데이터를 한 곳에서! 🚀


📊 View spreadsheets directly in Figma without switching tabs!


🚀 Key Features

• URL Integration: Load Google Sheets & Excel Online instantly with URLs

• File Upload: Drag & drop CSV, Excel files for immediate preview

• Edit/View Modes: Switch between real-time editing and read-only viewing

• Data Export: Download as CSV or copy to clipboard for easy data transfer


🎯 What Makes Us Different

✅ Only plugin supporting BOTH URL linking AND local file upload

✅ Drag & drop functionality - preview files in 3 seconds

✅ Handle large Excel files up to 10MB with advanced parsing

✅ Complete Korean language support for Korean designers


💼 Perfect For

• Design with real data instead of lorem ipsum

• Reference spec sheets from product managers in real-time

• Review client data files instantly without leaving Figma

• Build prototypes with actual spreadsheet content


🌟 Why Choose FigSheet?

Most spreadsheet plugins only support URLs OR files - we support BOTH! Plus our intuitive drag & drop interface and robust error handling make data integration seamless.


Stop switching between apps. Keep everything in Figma with FigSheet! 🚀
plugins.tagline: spreadsheet, excel, data

plugins.name: Tailwind Token Builder
plugins.description:
Tailwind Token Builder helps you generate clean, consistent Tailwind CSS tokens from your Figma designs using variables and naming conventions that match your codebase.


✅ Syncs with your design system

✅ Exports tokens in JSON format

✅ Built for Tailwind and design/dev collaboration


How to use it:

1.Select a frame or style set

2.Choose your token group (e.g. color, spacing, radius)

3.Generate a Tailwind-compatible JSON file in one click


This plugin is perfect for teams who want to bridge design and code with ease—no manual mapping, no guesswork.
plugins.tagline: Build Tailwind-compatible design tokens directly in Figma

139546.name: Tailwind Token Builder
139546.description:
Tailwind Token Builder helps you generate clean, consistent Tailwind CSS tokens from your Figma designs using variables and naming conventions that match your codebase.


✅ Syncs with your design system

✅ Exports tokens in JSON format

✅ Built for Tailwind and design/dev collaboration


How to use it:

1.Select a frame or style set

2.Choose your token group (e.g. color, spacing, radius)

3.Generate a Tailwind-compatible JSON file in one click


This plugin is perfect for teams who want to bridge design and code with ease—no manual mapping, no guesswork.
139546.tagline: Build Tailwind-compatible design tokens directly in Figma

plugins.name: TextFiller
plugins.description:
TextFiller helps you update multiple text layers with just one click. Perfect for designers working with text-heavy interfaces, landing pages, or any project with repetitive content updates.


✨ Key Features:

  1. Bulk update multiple text layers in one click
  2. Preserves all text formatting (fonts, sizes, colors, spacing)
  3. Smart name-based matching - no more manual copy-paste
  4. Clear feedback on applied changes
  5. Simple format: just paste "texto1: Your content here"


📝 How it works:

#1 - Name your text layers as "texto1", "texto2", "texto3"...

#2 - Paste your content in the plugin using the format:

texto1: Your headline here

texto2: Your description here

texto3: Call to action text

#3 - Click apply and watch the magic happen!


Perfect for:

  1. Landing pages with multiple text variations
  2. A/B testing different copy
  3. Localizing designs to multiple languages
  4. Updating placeholder text with real content
  5. Design systems with text templates


Save hours of repetitive work. Let TextFiller handle the boring stuff while you focus on design.
plugins.tagline: Apply multiple texts with one click while preserving styles

139563.name: TextFiller
139563.description:

plugins.name: G-code generation | GRBL/Marlin lasers
plugins.description:
This project is a Figma plugin that allows users to convert their vector designs into G-code suitable for laser cutting and engraving with Marlin firmware.


The community can find a powerful tool that bridges the gap between design and manufacturing, enabling a seamless workflow from Figma to a physical product.


Developers can learn from the modern tech stack, which includes React, Vite, and TypeScript, and explore the intricacies of Figma plugin development and G-code generation.


Makers and hobbyists can benefit from the simplified process of creating G-code without needing specialized CAM software.


Ultimately, this open-source project serves as a valuable resource for designers, developers, and enthusiasts to learn, collaborate, and innovate at the intersection of design and digital fabrication.


https://github.com/kriku/figma-gcode-plugin
plugins.tagline: Convert your Figma designs into G-code for laser cutting and engraving with Marlin firmware!

139404.name: G-code generation | GRBL/Marlin lasers
139404.description:
This project is a Figma plugin that allows users to convert their vector designs into G-code suitable for laser cutting and engraving with Marlin firmware.


The community can find a powerful tool that bridges the gap between design and manufacturing, enabling a seamless workflow from Figma to a physical product.


Developers can learn from the modern tech stack, which includes React, Vite, and TypeScript, and explore the intricacies of Figma plugin development and G-code generation.


Makers and hobbyists can benefit from the simplified process of creating G-code without needing specialized CAM software.


Ultimately, this open-source project serves as a valuable resource for designers, developers, and enthusiasts to learn, collaborate, and innovate at the intersection of design and digital fabrication.


https://github.com/kriku/figma-gcode-plugin
139404.tagline: Convert your Figma designs into G-code for laser cutting and engraving with Marlin firmware!

plugins.name: Table of Contents Creator
plugins.description:
Generates a list of clickable links to pages, frames, and sections.


Built-in exceptions include:

  1. Frames with names that start with ".", "_", or "Meeting Notes"
  2. Frames that are hidden or unnamed


Created as part of an effort to improve navigation for devs / stakeholders in Figma. If you have any feedback or suggestions, I'd love to chat!
plugins.tagline: Create links to frames, sections, and pages

139298.name: Table of Contents Creator
139298.description:
Generates a list of clickable links to pages, frames, and sections.


Built-in exceptions include:

  1. Frames with names that start with ".", "_", or "Meeting Notes"
  2. Frames that are hidden or unnamed


Created as part of an effort to improve navigation for devs / stakeholders in Figma. If you have any feedback or suggestions, I'd love to chat!
139298.tagline: Create links to frames, sections, and pages

plugins.name: Variable Copy Paste & Export
plugins.description:
Simple plugin that copies and pastes variables between files. Copied variables can also be exported into CSV format.


HOW TO USE:

  1. Open the plugin and hit "Copy Variables". The copied collections and modes should then appear in the plugin UI.
  2. Go to the file you want to paste to, open the plugin and hit "Paste".
  3. Double-check that the pasted variables match the original. Sometimes they get pasted out of order.
  4. Copied variables can also be exported by hitting "Export" and then clicking on the "Download CSV" link that appears underneath.


PLEASE NOTE: Aliases that reference external (non-local) variables will not work and will be shown in the console if found. Also, pasted variables may not always end up in their original order- I am not a dev and don't know why this happens (if anyone can help, please reach out!!!)
plugins.tagline: Paste variables between files and export to CSV

  3. Double-check that the pasted variables match the original. Sometimes they get pasted out of order.

plugins.name: Screen Count
plugins.description:
Screen Count updates the numbers on your screen labels based on position (top to bottom, left to right). Just add the name of the label container, select the flow or frame you want to update, and hit "Renumber".


You can now use letters instead of numbers or choose to append to the existing text rather than replace it.
plugins.tagline: Updated screen numbering for flows in a couple clicks

139292.name: Screen Count
139292.description:
Screen Count updates the numbers on your screen labels based on position (top to bottom, left to right). Just add the name of the label container, select the flow or frame you want to update, and hit "Renumber".


You can now use letters instead of numbers or choose to append to the existing text rather than replace it.
139292.tagline: Updated screen numbering for flows in a couple clicks

plugins.name: Sticky Freedom
plugins.description:
Present your design work in FigJam without worry. Sticky Freedom locks all your design elements while keeping sticky notes editable, so stakeholders can leave feedback without accidentally moving or editing your work.


Perfect for:

  1. Design reviews and critiques
  2. Stakeholder presentations
  3. Client feedback sessions
  4. Cross-team design shares
  5. Async feedback collection


How it works:

  1. Import or create your designs in FigJam
  2. Run Sticky Freedom to lock everything except sticky notes
  3. Share with confidence - stakeholders can only add sticky note feedback
  4. Toggle back to unlock when you need to make updates


One click protection. No more "oops, I moved something" moments. No more duplicate boards for safety. Just your designs, protected, with feedback flowing freely through sticky notes.
plugins.tagline: Collect feedback, while keeping your designs safe.

plugins.name: Ai A/B testing Generator
plugins.description:
🎨 Supercharge your design process with AI A/B Testing Generator!

This powerful plugin uses AI to create multiple A/B test variations of your selected elements in seconds.

🧠 Smarter decisions, 💡 creative ideas, and 🚀 faster iterations—right inside Figma!


Features:

✨ AI-generated A/B options for UI elements

🔁 Rapid iteration and idea exploration

📊 Perfect for UX designers, marketers, and product teams
